name: mini.fox Redux
additional_info: Incorporating MimiGlyphs by Sallee Design. Also includes edits of bionx's minimal floating scrollbars, Frank's Bright Focus and interavtivedesigner's Black Menus. Additionally, MacType with LCD profile will enhance the overall look. NOTICE: MacType will not work with Hardware Acceleration. Make sure you have this feature ticked off under the Browsing section in Options > Advanced > General.
